content: this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face description the forest breeze v-neck crochet tee is an easy modern crochet top this v-neck tee is super versatile and can be worn during summer autumn or spring this crochet top is created from 4 panels front back and 2 sleeves that are seamed together the forest breeze v-neck crochet tee also has a sister pattern the sea breeze tank top the sea breeze is a crochet v-neck tank top that s perfect for summer sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
